Thomas Lavern Alward (born October 13, 1952) was a National Football League (NFL) offensive guard who played in 1976 for the Tampa Bay Buccaneers. He attended high school at Bendle High School, college at the University of Nebraskaâ€“Lincoln and was the New York Jets 6th round pick in the 1975 NFL draft.
He is currently head football coach at Goodrich High School in Goodrich, Michigan.
